title: 怎么这样生成怪物
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content: 怎么在每个玩家身边生成一只皮革套木剑僵尸

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
比如楼上的命令就是错的。

下次注明版本

1.7/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {Equipments:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b}]}复制代码

1.8/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b}]}复制代码

1.12/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b}]}复制代码

1.13/execute at @a run summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b}]}复制代码

replies.author: xiaowei233v
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaowei233v 于 2018-8-22 18:04 编辑 

楼上是什么回答
1.12/execute @a ~ ~ ~ /summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b}]}复制代码
1.13
/execute as @a at @s run /summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b}]}复制代码
推荐几个好东西生成器1.12/1.13 https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator
1.12--1.13转换器 https://spu.spgoding.com
生成器有些生成出来的纯属多余 删不删随你便
看我这么可怜收个最佳回答呗awa

[感谢楼下的提醒awa光顾着生成僵尸没好好看清题目awa

replies.author: 炎炎夏曰
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-22 16:57
比如楼上的命令就是错的。

下次注明版本
1.7貌似没有/execute吧。。
